user_instruction: 'Compose an email to reply to GeoAnalytica Inc. (contact@geoanalyticainc.com), our contractor. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["contact@geoanalyticainc.com"],"subject":"Grandview Bridge – Soil Analysis Next Steps","body":"Hello GeoAnalytica Team,

Thank you for your continued support on the Grandview Bridge project.

Our preliminary site investigations have confirmed elevated moisture levels and significant clay content across the foundation area. Because of these conditions, the project will require a tailored foundation solution. 

Could you please review these findings and let us know:
1. Whether you anticipate any changes to your planned testing methods or analytical approach;
2. An updated target timeline for submitting your full report; and
3. Any implications this may have on cost or staffing so we can plan accordingly.

If you need additional background or clarifications, feel free to reach out. We look forward to receiving your insights and continuing our collaboration.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Company Name]
[Contact Information]"}
